content.text: Lieutenant Junior Grade Rokkaku was one of Axe-Hand Morgan's officers at the 153rd Marine Branch. He currently serves under Commander Ripper.
Rokakku has tanned skin, with prominent cheekbones and a black (light color in the manga) mustache and beard. He has a scar above his right eye.

Although everyone was scared of Morgan's wrath, he was willing to stand up against him when he ordered him to kill Rika, showing that he is brave enough to stand up for what he believes in. Also, in contrast to Morgan, he is not a heartless person as he refused to kill a little girl.
As a Marine, he most likely had to go through training and so may have some combat skills.

When Morgan was discovered that Rika was still alive after trespassing into the courtyard of the Marine base, he immediately ordered Rokkaku to go into town and kill her. Rokkaku refused to do so because she was just a little girl. Upon hearing this, Morgan exclaimed that his orders were absolute, but Rokkaku refused once again. Because of this "insubordination", he was slashed down the back by Morgan's axe-hand.
After the timeskip, Rokkaku is shown to have survived his former captain's attack and was enjoying food at the canteen. He still works at the Marine Base but now serves under Ripper.
Instead of being slashed down the back by Morgan's axe-hand, he was simply knocked out by him using the side of his axe.

elements.text: One Piece: Become the Pirate King!

His name apparently comes from a villain in Romance Dawn, Version 2, a prototypical One Piece manga. This is the only resemblance between the characters. Interestingly, Rokkaku (lit. Hexagon) has a face shaped like his namesake.
For some unknown reason, his scar disappeared in his post timeskip reappearance.
